meanings.definition: A person who carries out a transaction.
meanings.sent1: The transactors at the bank completed the deposit.
meanings.sent2: The transactors exchanged money for goods at the store.
meanings.sent3: The transactors decided to play a game of trading to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, transactors are the key players in the market.
meanings.sent5: The diligent transactors ensured that the deal was finalized smoothly.

meanings.definition: The parties involved in a transaction.
meanings.sent1: All the transactors agreed on the terms of the contract.
meanings.sent2: The transactors gathered to discuss the details of the deal.
meanings.sent3: During the negotiation, the transactors shared a laugh over a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The transactors in the room represented different companies with unique interests.
meanings.sent5: The transactors shook hands, sealing the agreement with a firm grip.
